author: heinz.gassner
title: Examine PoS-Advantages of Cardano
description: 世界中の規制当局は、PoSステーキングプロトコルの実現性を脅かしています。これは、必要な差別化を行わずに

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is part of a bigger project funded in Fund 6. Researching and analysing the legal possibilities of an ISO and integrating that into a risk and opportunity radar will provide legal direction and security for anyone receiving tokens as part of an ISO. As a EU-citizen I can say that there is currently no legal framework for any of this in my country and the ruling sentiment regarding these products is one of uncertainty in terms of fiscality. These frameworks are eventually needed as cryptographic currencies (and products) gain more adoption.
f6_assessments.q1: This is an addition on a project that has been previously funded and intends to provide a legal framework in order to identify risks and opportunities for trade in cryptographic products. The proposing team is possesses the necessary competencies to create this.
f6_assessments.q2: The entire project is massive. Something of this scale needs to be very structured in order to preserve on overview of the bigger picture. All the proposals related to the main project that have been proposed in the current fund are interlinked and recycle each other's auditability, in which no factor is missing.

f6_assessments.q0: This Proposal is a proposal "par excellence" on its way to address effectively the Challenge and the Challenges purpose. By providing very first research to strengthen the thematic on which the Challenge's purpose is built creates a community wide value as necessary data will be collected and displayed.
f6_assessments.q1: The DL360 Team has proven in the past that funded proposals are executed vet effectively and successfully. The proposers build strong relations within the ecosystem to strengthen their position and resource pool as well as building strong relationships to external parties and projects. The given Informations in the Proposal promise a very effective solution and needed information is well explained. The given Roadmap and KPIs/OKRs are realistic and well designed. The Proposal does give us a clear image of what their success would look like, space for individual interpretation of the Proposal is minimized.
f6_assessments.q2: The Proposals' purpose to build Blueprints creates value to the whole community as information and progress will be tracked, documented and then fusioned into an accessible product for the whole community. The auditability of this proposal is therefore effective, accessible and transparent to the community and other projects will benefit from the proposals execution and progress.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the challenge very effectively and innovatively. What makes this project, perhaps, stand out from several of the competing proposals, is that it focuses on the crypto legislation aspect, but also the legislation aspect (e.g. regarding the classification of taxable events) specific to Cardano, like PoS (e.g. are weekly rewards similarly taxable like mining?), staking pools etc.
f6_assessments.q1: The experience of the proposal's team to successfully implement the plan is excellent, with a great track record. The presented plan is realistic, pragmatic, and positively escapes explaining the idea only from a very general level and focuses very well to the specifics and details of the project, incl. what is unique and special to Cardano or Cardano-like cryptocurrencies.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal presents excellent progress and success measurements, which are convincing and suitable with the project, in order to (better) audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Great and detailed proposal. Considering the regulatory environment in EU with MiCA regulation, such work is important. I wish your team can do more than investigate possible advantages with regards to complying with emerging regulatory frameworks. 

Complying with regulation is important, however, complying with favorable regulations would help deepen innovation in the crypto space and to benefit cardano as well.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has great experience to deliver. The outcomes are practice and measurables. The proposal would be a success if funded.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget has great breakdown which would be useful for auditing. Also reporting component demonstrate the team's transparency to deliver the project. I think it is traceable and should be given the needed support.

solution: EU規制の最新のPoS関連要素を分析し、カルダノ特有のメリットを考慮したいと思います。
experience: 30年以上にわたる業界リーダーとしての経験、柔軟なコアチームと著名なドメインエキスパートのネットワーク
